altername_name: Knights of the Zodiac: The Phoenix Returns
Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco: O Retorno da Fênix
Les Chevaliers du Zodiaque: Le Retour du Phénix
Los Caballeros del Zodiaco: El regreso del Fénix
name: Saint Seiya: El Regreso del Fénix
overview: The knights always appear when evil tries to harm the world, the knights of the zodiac come to the GameBoy Color in this fan made made with love for all fans. Relive your childhood imagining what it would have been like to have a title like this in your time. Relive the story of the Knights of the Zodiac for more than 10 levels that tell the arc of the Black Saints. Secrets and collectibles. 4 playable characters PixelArt to illustrate the story Music based on Anime. ***If you want to help with the translation of this game into other languages, please contact me on one of my networks. Languages available so far: ENGLISH: 100% BY EL RAMSES (FROM SAINT SEIYA COSMO CAST PODCAST) SPANISH 100% PORTUGUESE 100% BY JAIR LIRA FRANCE 100% BY THUNDARD ITALIAN 100% BY GRETA AUGUSTO
